name: MusicSubscriptionOffer.MessageIdentifier
desc: An identifier for the main message that the subscription offer sheet presents to the user.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a message identifier with the specified raw value.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a message identifier with the specified raw value.

items.name: let rawValue: String
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.

items.name: static let addMusic: MusicSubscriptionOffer.MessageIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier for the message that invites the user to add music to their library by subscribing to Apple Music.

items.name: static let join: MusicSubscriptionOffer.MessageIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier for the message that invites the user to join Apple Music.

items.name: static let playMusic: MusicSubscriptionOffer.MessageIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier for the message that invites the user to play music by subscribing to Apple Music.
